short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-generated product descriptions, blog posts and ad texts based on world-leading AI technology.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Straact is a platform for the commercial copywriter. Based on world-leading AI technology, Straact is able to generate product descriptions, blog posts and text for commercials based on a few keywords.

Using Straact one is able to write content 3 times faster than before. It works on every page and shows as a side-panel at the right of the screen.

This Chrome Extension is a part of our platform, meaning they are communicating. Therefore, it is necessary for you to register on https://app.straact.com in order for the extension to function.
